channel.title: STALKER Call of Pripyat
channel.description:
This is a thread for STALKER fans to post news on the upcoming game from GSC, STALKER Call of Pripyat. I've been a big STALKER fan for the past few years since S:SHOC came out, and after finishing both STALKER games many times and playing them with mods, I cant wait for a new one. Here are some screenshots:
[img]https://stalker.uz/files/gallery/COP/cop_screens_-Stalker.Uz-_06.jpg[/img]
[img]https://static.computergames.ro/cg/assassin/images5/stalkercallofpripyat/stalkercallofpripyat006.jpg[/img]
[img]https://static.computergames.ro/cg/assassin/images5/stalkercallofpripyat/stalkercallofpripyat003.jpg[/img]
[img]https://stalker-zone.info/_nw/6/24721.jpg[/img]
[img]https://jeux-video.portail.free.fr/actualite/21-07-2009/pripyatisme/81151.jpg[/img]
[img]https://www.incgamers.com/images/screenshots/7511orig.jpg[/img]
![](upload://ftkZDpajlwPGlZRc8REuvi5cgHW.jpeg)
[img]https://www.pixelplayer.se/bilder/texter/nyhet_1486_1.jpeg[/img]
[img]https://www.recenzeher.eu/img/novinky/1529/stalker-call-of-pripyat-scr034.jpg[/img]
![](upload://23K8r4cFHsgw1Dzmjd264o7lnLE.jpeg)
Trailer: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i1lDskma6V0[/url]
The official website: [url='https://cop.stalker-game.com/']https://cop.stalker-game.com/[/url]

item.title: STALKER Call of Pripyat
item.dc:creator: free2game
item.description:
CTID:

Read below.

Not true, actually. My parents have an Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.13 Ghz and a 9800 GT @ 512 MB, and it runs at Max settings with Full Dynamic Lighting with the resolution set at 1920x1080 without a hitch.

None of this is required to run the game. I’m just being a dick about required vs recommended.

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER Call of Pripyat
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
free2game:

The required specs for all of the stalker games have been
Windows 2000 (SP 4)
Intel Pentium 4 2 GHz/AMD Athlon XP 2200+
512 MB RAM,
nVidia GeForce 5700/ATI Radeon 9600/128MB DirectX 9c compatible video card

nothing gets much lower than that hardware wise today

Read below.

eternalness:

Those are the bare minimum specs. The recommended specs, which u still can’t come close to maxing the game out on a decent res…

Not true, actually. My parents have an Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.13 Ghz and a 9800 GT @ 512 MB, and it runs at Max settings with Full Dynamic Lighting with the resolution set at 1920x1080 without a hitch.

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER Call of Pripyat
item.dc:creator: eternalness
item.description:
free2game:

The required specs for all of the stalker games have been
Windows 2000 (SP 4)
Intel Pentium 4 2 GHz/AMD Athlon XP 2200+
512 MB RAM,
nVidia GeForce 5700/ATI Radeon 9600/128MB DirectX 9c compatible video card

nothing gets much lower than that hardware wise today

Those are the bare minimum specs. The recommended specs, which u still can’t come close to maxing the game out on a decent res, are:

Intel Core 2 Duo E7400 / AMD 64 X2 5600+
2 GB RAM
512 MB DirectX® 9.0c compatible card / nVIDIA® GeForce™ 9800 GTX / ATI Radeon® HD 4850

Also this game supports DX11, so you’ll need a windows 7/vista (when they patch it for DX11) and an ATI Radeon HD 5000 series card, unless nvidia releases a DX11 card between now and the english version of the game’s release date, if you want to be able to take advantage of this feature. The english version will be released anywhere from November 2009 to January 2010.

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER Call of Pripyat
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
Yeah, but with those specs you can run it at 640 x 480, no AA, crappy textures and squarish models.

item.title: STALKER Call of Pripyat
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
CTID:

The “$game_date@ =true| true|” thing should be in the STALKER folder where the game files are. The “user.ltx” is in "Documents And Settings\All Users\Shared Documents*I forget the name, but has to do with STALKER’s Name*.

I changed both, but the mod crashes for me whenever it finishes loading. Shame, really. I wanted to try it pretty badly.

I still can’t find it, and I still have no idea how to change the gloss factor to 2.5.

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER Call of Pripyat
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
"Com[e:

r;66447"]hey guys, i contribute no more to the gaming industry than I do to the BM community. .)

Fixed. I realise that attempt at subtlety might result in confusion. Here’s a clue: nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER Call of Pripyat
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
JohnKiller118:

Okay, I have completed one step out of the three steps needed to get the “STALKER Complete 2009” mod runnig.

"[i]1) In the main STALKER directory (by default it’s “C:\Program Files\THQ\S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - Shadow of Chernobyl”,
and for Steam users “Steam\SteamApps\Common\Stalker shadow of Chernobyl”), locate file “fsgame.ltx”,
open with Notepad and change both variables in this line to “true”:

$game_data$ = true| true| $fs_root$|[/i]"

I can’t find it.

"[i]3) In the “user.ltx” file change gloss factor to 2.5:

r2_gloss_factor 2.5[/i]"

I have no idea how to change the gloss factor to 2.5

The “$game_date@ =true| true|” thing should be in the STALKER folder where the game files are. The “user.ltx” is in "Documents And Settings\All Users\Shared Documents*I forget the name, but has to do with STALKER’s Name*.

I changed both, but the mod crashes for me whenever it finishes loading. Shame, really. I wanted to try it pretty badly.

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER Call of Pripyat
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
Okay, I have completed one step out of the three steps needed to get the “STALKER Complete 2009” mod runnig.

"[i]1) In the main STALKER directory (by default it’s “C:\Program Files\THQ\S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - Shadow of Chernobyl”,
and for Steam users “Steam\SteamApps\Common\Stalker shadow of Chernobyl”), locate file “fsgame.ltx”,
open with Notepad and change both variables in this line to “true”:

$game_data$ = true| true| $fs_root$|[/i]"

I can’t find it.

"[i]3) In the “user.ltx” file change gloss factor to 2.5:

r2_gloss_factor 2.5[/i]"

I have no idea how to change the gloss factor to 2.5

Read full topic

item.title: STALKER Call of Pripyat
item.dc:creator: Com_e_r
item.description:
So you’ve never played online then.

well, actually there is a problem - there is a delay before someone’ll find a way to play global servers online, but i don’t like active social life and huge gathering of unknown people, i prefer singleplayer, so that’s not a problem to me; moreover, for short tournaments in something like TF2 or cs :s there always is local network .)

item.description:
JohnKiller118:

Well, I got it! I can’t possibly pass up a deal like this!
For once, IGN doesn’t completely suck.

Oh, and I also have Left 4 Dead 1 on PC now. So I spent $20 on two new(ish) games this week. God I love PC gaming.

:fffuuu:

I spent $30 on it on monday.
